title: Ticket #7092: Prefer this subsystem's specific token, if available.
description:
When a daemon operating as a client looks for a token to use, look for tokens for the daemon's subsystem before checking any others (especially including tokens for other subsystems).

See the commit 'Improve token location algorithm. #7006' from https://github.com/htcondor/htcondor/pull/50
remarks:
2019-Jun-07 07:51:22 by bbockelm:
Separated out into https://github.com/htcondor/htcondor/pull/55

2019-Jun-08 22:02:41 by tlmiller:
Code Review

Looked good to me. Changed 'subsys' to 'subsys_agt_name', perhaps unnecessarily.

Note that, despite the name, findTokens() doesn't return a list of tokens that could work, but simply the first one of those it finds. Thus, this commit isn't an optimization, but also a correctness issue. As such, this deserves a test.

2019-Aug-04 13:37:51 by bbockelm:
As the auto-generated tokens were not released prior to the change in this ticket, I am going to be including this ticket's documentation in the docs for #7094 and #7080.
